main event: An observer in Lafayette, California, reported seeing a bright light that started blinking furiously and began swirling towards their house.
interesting points: The observer witnessed the light over the course of 7 minutes., The light exhibited unusual motion which was described as swirling towards the observer's house., The report indicates there was no physical evidence or photographs of the event., The observer expressed a belief that the light was aware of being watched., This sighting might be categorized as a satellite or celestial body, but the observer's description suggested more investigation was warranted.
sighted object: a bright blinking light in the sky
witness description: an individual who reported the sighting in a UFO report document
